rukus.text: hananimkkeseo haneul-eul dusa gwon neung-gwa neunglyeog-eulo nop-i dugo neolbge dusyeoss-eumyeo
daejileul dudoe neolbge pyeolchyeoss-euneo eolmana aleumdabge pyeolchyeo jyeossneunyo
hananim-i modeun geos-eul changjoha sidoe jaung-eul dueoss-euni ilo hayeo neohuiga gyohun-eul eoddolog ham-ila
geuleomeulo seodulleo hananimkkeloola sillo naneun geubunkkeseo neohuie ge bonaen bunmyeonghan seonjijala
hananimgwa deobul-eo daleun geos-eul sungbaehaji malla sillo naega geubun-eu lobuteo neohuiege on bunmyeonghan seonji jala
geudeul ijeon-edo seonjijaga baegseongdeul-ege wass-eudoe geudeul ttohan geuneun ma sulsayo animyeon michinjala malhaessdeola
geudeul-i seolo-ege sangsoghan yu san-ilado doendan mal-inga sillo geudeul eun omanhan baegseongdeul-ila
geuleomeulo geudeul-eul meollihala geulihamyeon munchaegbadji anh-eul geos-ila
geuleona geudaeui mesejileul galeuchila midneun sindodeul-ege yuighanila
naega yeongmawa ingan-eul changjoham-eungeudeul-i naleul seomgige halyeo ham-ila
naega geudeul-ege il-yonghal yangsig eul guhaji anihamyeo ttohan naleul bu yanghagil balajido anhnola
sillo hananim-eun gwonneung-gwa him-ui junim-euloseo il-yonghal yangsig-eul bepuneun suyeojaisila
joejieun mulineun geudeul donglyoui muliwa yusahan beol-eul badnola geuleo meulo na-ege seodulleo guhaji anhdo log hala
geudeul-i yagsogbad-eun geunal-eul midji anihan jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eulila
